resources.string:
It is an app that you enjoy the decorations the icon of Professor Irof there.
 Please choose a favorite icon to scroll to the right
 
 Eye icon:Evaluation of the painting 
 trash icon:Turn off all the lines wrote
 spark icon:Erase the previous line 
 flag icon:unlock /loc the picture 
 
 To post twitter or save images Decorations
 Please select from the menu button
